label: Vision & Mission
heading: Vision & Mission of the Department
description: To develop competent civil engineers with strong technical knowledge, ethical values, and commitment to sustainable infrastructure development for society.

sections.heading: Vision
items: To be a leading institution in civil engineering education, producing graduates who contribute to sustainable infrastructure development and societal progress.

sections.heading: Mission of the Department
items: To provide quality education in civil engineering aligned with industry standards and emerging technologies.
To enhance problem-solving and research capabilities in infrastructure development and construction management.
To foster innovation, entrepreneurship, and ethical practices in civil engineering.
To provide exposure to modern construction techniques, tools, and sustainable building practices.
